verses.verse: Woe <S%H480><s%> is me! <S%H3588>for<s%> I <S%H1961>am<s%> as when they have <S%H625>gathered<s%> the summer <S%H7019>fruits,<s%> as the grape <S%H5955>gleanings<s%> of the <S%H1210>vintage:<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H811>cluster<s%> to <S%H398>eat:<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>desired<s%> the firstripe <S%H1063>fruit.<s%>

The <S%H2623>good<s%> man is <S%H6>perished<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H3477>upright<s%> among <S%H120>men:<s%> they <S%H3605>all<s%> lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> for <S%H1818>blood;<s%> they <S%H6679>hunt<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> with a <S%H2764>net.<s%>

That they may do <S%H5921>evil<s%> <S%H7451><s%> with both <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H3190>earnestly,<s%> the <S%H8269>prince<s%> <S%H7592>asketh,<s%> and the <S%H8199>judge<s%> asketh for a <S%H7966>reward;<s%> and the <S%H1419>great<s%> man, <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1696>uttereth<s%> his <S%H1942>mischievous<s%> <S%H5315>desire:<s%> so they wrap it <S%H5686>up.<s%>

The <S%H2896>best<s%> of them is as a <S%H2312>brier:<s%> the most <S%H3477>upright<s%> is sharper than a thorn <S%H4480>hedge:<s%> <S%H4534><s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of thy <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> and thy <S%H6486>visitation<s%> <S%H935>cometh;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> their <S%H3998>perplexity.<s%>

Trust <S%H539><s%> ye <S%H408>not<s%> in a <S%H7453>friend,<s%> put ye not <S%H982>confidence<s%> <S%H408><s%> in a <S%H441>guide:<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H6607>doors<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> from her that <S%H4480>lieth<s%> <S%H7901><s%> in thy <S%H2436>bosom.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5034>dishonoreth<s%> the <S%H1>father,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> riseth <S%H6965>up<s%> against her <S%H517>mother,<s%> the <S%H3618>daughter-in-law<s%> against her <S%H2545>mother-in-law;<s%> a <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H341>enemies<s%> are the <S%H376>men<s%> of his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>
Therefore <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H6822>look<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> I will <S%H3176>wait<s%> for the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation:<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> me.

Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> against me, O mine <S%H341>enemy:<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H5307>fall,<s%> I shall <S%H6965>arise;<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be a <S%H216>light<s%> unto me.

I will <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2197>indignation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against him, <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H7378>plead<s%> my <S%H7379>cause,<s%> and <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> for me: he will bring me <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H216>light,<s%> and I shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

Then she that is mine <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and <S%H955>shame<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> her which <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H346>Where<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God?<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> her: <S%H6258>now<s%> shall she <S%H1961>be<s%> trodden <S%H4823>down<s%> as the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%>
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that thy <S%H1447>walls<s%> are to be <S%H1129>built,<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H2706>decree<s%> be far <S%H7368>removed.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> also he shall <S%H935>come<s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> thee <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and from the <S%H4693>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H4693>fortress<s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H5104>river,<s%> and from <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H4480>sea,<s%> <S%H3220><s%> and from <S%H2022>mountain<s%> to <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

Notwithstanding the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%> because <S%H5921>of<s%> them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein, for the <S%H4480>fruit<s%> <S%H6529><s%> of their <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

Feed <S%H7462><s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> with thy <S%H7626>rod,<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of thine <S%H5159>heritage,<s%> which <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H910>solitarily<s%> in the <S%H3293>wood,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3760>Carmel:<s%> let them <S%H7462>feed<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> and <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old.<s%>
According to the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy coming <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will I <S%H7200>show<s%> unto him <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> things.

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> and be <S%H954>confounded<s%> at <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> their <S%H1369>might:<s%> they shall <S%H7760>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> their <S%H241>ears<s%> shall be <S%H2790>deaf.<s%>

They shall <S%H3897>lick<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> like a <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> they shall <S%H7264>move<s%> out of their <S%H4480>holes<s%> <S%H4526><s%> like <S%H2119>worms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> they shall be <S%H6342>afraid<s%> <S%H413>of<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> and shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> because <S%H4480>of<s%> thee.

Who <S%H4310><s%> is a <S%H410>God<s%> like unto <S%H3644>thee,<s%> that <S%H5375>pardoneth<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and passeth <S%H5674>by<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of his <S%H5159>heritage?<s%> he <S%H2388>retaineth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H5703>forever,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H2654>delighteth<s%> in <S%H2617>mercy.<s%>

He will turn <S%H7725>again,<s%> he will have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> upon us; he will <S%H3533>subdue<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquities;<s%> and thou wilt <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2403>sins<s%> into the <S%H4688>depths<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

Thou wilt <S%H5414>perform<s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and the <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto our <S%H1>fathers<s%> from the <S%H4480>days<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of <S%H6924>old.<s%>
